ygData.msgSnippet: No, that s not true. If you re holding them or something then you can say that you punched them, or you shot them, but its up to them to post damage. If,

No, that's not true. If you're holding them or something then you can say
that you punched them, or you shot them, but its up to them to post
damage. If, however, you're not holding them, all actions have to be made
as attempts.


On Tue, 1 May 2001, Scorpius (No last name) wrote:

> [Hey, is it true that you can post that your character is beating up another 
> person's character or that your has kicked aonther in the head or something 
> like that as long as you don't post the damage for the other character?
>
